name: CRMIReleaseExperimentalBehavior
title: CRMI Release Experimental Behavior Codes
description: Behaviors of 'experimentalBehavior' parameter application in the $release operation.

concept.definition: The repository should throw an error if a specification which is not Experimental references Experimental components.
The repository should warn if a specification which is not Experimental references Experimental components.
The repository does not need to consider the state of Experimental.
